replies.body:
If you are permanently banned for toxicity, I'm afraid there's no recourse to regain that account -- your 14-day ban warning specifically mentions that the next ban is a permanent one, and that is the last warning.

Unless you were immediately permanently banned? In that case you MIGHT be able to argue your case, but that would depend on the severity of your behavior, and we'd need to see your chat logs for that.

----------------

If, however, it is NOT a permanent ban then you're in luck -- just make sure you REALLY improve your behavior and you should be able to work the punishment back down.

I think DeepTerrorNami once said something like...

If you're sorry, you're welcome to make a new account and keep playing with everyone.

Sorry Nami if I'm missquoting you.

If the ban is permanent, there is no reversing it unless there was a mistake.

How much money you put in doesn't matter.

If you cared about the money you would have protected your investment.
